description: This file implements stack operations for a BSP engine component, including functions to add, access, and manage variables on a runtime stack, as well as dump stack contents and manage stack state.

classes.name: BSP_TEMPLATE_STACK_OBJECT
classes.description: Data structure representing a stack object with methods to manipulate and access stack variables and state.

classes.name: BSP_TEMPLATE_VAR_OBJECT
classes.description: Data structure for individual stack variables, supporting various types like number, string, object, array, etc.

classes.name: BSP_TEMPLATE_STATE
classes.description: Structure representing the saved state (base and top positions) of the stack.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE BspTemplateStackAdd(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulCount)
methods.description: Adds given count of variables onto the stack, growing the stack buffer if necessary, and resets the new variables.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE BspTemplateStackGetAt(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulIndex)
methods.description: Retrieves the stack variable at a specified index.

methods.name: ULONG BspTemplateStackGetCount(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the number of variables currently on the stack.

methods.name: ULONG BspTemplateStackGetBase(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the base position of the stack.

methods.name: ULONG BspTemplateStackGetTop(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the current top position of the stack.

methods.name: void BspTemplateStackGetState(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PBSP_TEMPLATE_STATE pState)
methods.description: Fills a given state structure with the current base and top positions.

methods.name: void BspTemplateStackNewFunction(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PBSP_TEMPLATE_STATE pState)
methods.description: Sets the stack's base position to the top, effectively resetting the current stack frame.

methods.name: void BspTemplateStackDeleteFunction(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PBSP_TEMPLATE_STATE pState)
methods.description: Restores the stack to a saved state, resetting variables in the current frame.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE BspTemplateStackGetBufferAt(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulIndex)
methods.description: Retrieves a buffer of variables starting at a specified index.

methods.name: void BspTemplateStackDump(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Outputs the contents of the stack variables for debugging or inspection.
